item.title: Second
item.description: 第一篇博文？ introduction aim:prepare for aps deadline:January age:21 cv what when where

Information theory and coding Introduction It is a discipline that applies the methods of ==probability theory==, ==stochastic processes== , ==mathematical statistics== , and ==modern algebra== to study general laws in information transmission, extraction, and processing. It researches the basic problem of Information theory—Measurement of information Distortion-Free Source Coding Theorem-Shannon's First Theorem Channel coding theorem-Shannon's second theorem Source coding, channel coding Some important concepts Sample space: The various states in which something can occur
